title: Eddie Trunk’s Essential Hard Rock and Heavy Metal
description: An updated edition of the first book by VH1’s music expert, Eddie TrunkKnown as a leading expert on all things hard rock and heavy metal, Eddie Trunk has updated and expanded this book with even more on the subject. Eddie discusses his most essential bands, his unique personal experiences with them, his favorite “Stump the Trunk” anecdotes and trivia, as well as his favorite playlists. Whether you’re a classic Metallic and Megadeath metalhead or prefer the hair metal of old-school bands like Bon Jovi or Poison, this book salutes those who rock.
author: Eddie Trunk
